about_the_game:
OopsFixers Company — is a cooperative game for up to 4 players that invites you to become part of the world's most daring company. We take on tasks that others refuse to do: anomalies, dangerous situations, and challenges that seem impossible. The company believes in you, and together we can overcome any obstacles!

Game Features.

- Unique characters with their own abilities: Each team member has their own strengths and characteristics. Someone has sharp eyesight, but may have a hearing impairment. Others have excellent hearing but are unsure of their vision. There are those who remain silent even in the most extreme situations, and those who do not like physical activity and need the support of the team. These characteristics add depth to the gameplay and encourage close cooperation.

- Teamwork comes first: Collaboration and coordination with your partners are key to successfully completing contracts. Use the unique abilities of each character to complement each other and overcome the most difficult challenges.

- Diverse and unpredictable contracts: Each task brings new challenges. From solving mysteries to confronting unusual phenomena, you never know what's next for you.

- Team Improvement and Development: Complete contracts, earn resources, and upgrade your team and equipment. Training and development will help you be prepared for any situation.

- Humor in the most difficult situations: Even when things don't go according to plan, there is always room for a smile. This makes the game even more exciting and adds a special charm.

Why choose OopsFixers Company?

We believe that impossible is just a word waiting for those who are ready to challenge it. In our company, there is no such thing as “too risky” or “it's crazy” - we call it just another day at work.

Are you ready to take on the challenge?

Join OopsFixers Company and become part of a team that is not afraid of the unknown. Together, we will prove that any difficulty can be overcome by working together and utilizing each other's strengths.

Don't forget: if something can go wrong, it will go wrong. But that's exactly why we exist!

Key features:

  • - Cooperative gameplay for up to 4 players.

  • - Voice communication

  • - Unique characters with their own abilities and characteristics.

  • - Unpredictable and varied tasks.

  • - A system of team improvement and development

  • - Combination of tension and humor for an unforgettable gaming experience

Join us and discover a world where the impossible becomes possible!

short_description: OopsFixers Company is a cooperative action game for up to 4 players where you work in a team to fix extreme situations that other companies avoid. Control unique characters. Collaborate with your teammates. Improve your team to be ready for the impossible.
